title: Does anyone know what the 02 font is please?
content: Does anyone know what the 02 font is please?
author: johnboymoulton

comments.content:
If you mean the company with the music venues: that’s custom type.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

If you mean the mobile phone provider, I'm quite sure that it's frutiger bold (also referred as 65) but I could be wrong, try checking it in "what the font" if you have an image of it, I couldn't find it.
The mobile phone provider’s name is **O2**.

Yeah, and in most spreadshheets there is a field named O2, which in my case is formated to display Verdana 13pt.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
I believe Myriad was the official font of 2002

Could be — anyway, the logo of O2, the Télefonica company is NOT Frutiger. I just checked.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
